I've tried again and again to play this game -- all with different settings and everything -- but the motion sickness was really bad; I couldn't play past the first 10 minutes. If you're the type of person to get queasy, i wouldn't recommend this game.

Such a great game that not only expands upon the core premise of the first game but also allows the community to get creative. Additionally, the story is immersive yet hilarious, and it really allows the user to gather a deep understanding of this world. I'm happy to further boost this game's ratings among the thousands of others who agree with me. Portal 2 is a blast to play.

Apart from the gameplay, the storyline is so good and has drastically improved from portal 1.

100/10, fucking amazing.
